existing_features.title: Update all user-facing location text across the frontend to reflect the Kekri, Rajasthan location instead of Mumbai, including the “Visit Us” section copy, page SEO titles/descriptions, and any other hardcoded mentions of “Mumbai”, the Mumbai address, or the old phone number.
Ensure the Kekri address/contact information and map embed are sourced from the shared marketing configuration so that Footer, Contact page, map embed, and any ‘Visit Us’ blocks stay consistent.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update all “Visit Us” address/contact text and map location from Mumbai to Kekri, Rajasthan (1st Floor K.J Tower, Above B.O.B Bank, Ajmer Road, Kekri)

Update MARKETING_CONFIG to match the user-provided Kekri location details (Visit Us in Kekri; 1st Floor K.J Tower Above B.O.B Bank Ajmer Road Kekri; Kekri, Rajasthan) and ensure the configured phone number matches the intended contact number for the updated location.

projectName: Update all site location/contact copy and map to Kekri (replace Mumbai)
